tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Mixed Messages
programme.desc: An intruder shoots three Navy people, killing two. One of the dead is a friend of Harm, who protects his reputation. Webb, counter-espionage, and disinformation are involved; Bud solves it. Mac and Renee return to town; Mac leaves again.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Ambush
programme.desc: Capt. Shepard leads his troop off its peacekeeping mission and into battle with the colonel of the rebel forces. Consequently, six marines die in the public incident. Harm is sent in to investigate despite a recent touch of bad luck in a string of trials.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Jag-a-thon
programme.desc: The JAG gang takes part in a JAGathon, a charity-benefit marathon, which provides opportunities for personal pride and individual competitiveness. Sturgis feels uncertain, and Harm defends a sailor for impersonating an officer.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Mission
programme.desc: A spotter on the ground calls for an airstrike as he has identified 15 heavily armed suspected Al Qaeda members on horseback. JAG won’t approve the airstrike until the spotter is absolutely certain the men are Al Qaeda members.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Defending His Honor
programme.desc: An ambulance pulls up to a crash site where a woman, Jennifer Wilson, is found injured and crying for her baby. Unbeknownst to her, the six-month-old baby died in the accident. A Navy judge stands accused of vehicular homicide.(n)

programme.title: JAG: In Country
programme.desc: Central Command coordinates an airstrike on a confirmed target traveling through Afghanistan. After the strike is launched, marine troops assess the damage and they are disturbed to learn that they targeted the wrong vehicle and hit civilians instead.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: True Colors
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must pass a mandated psych evaluation or face being disbanded after they're accused of destroying a priceless work of art in an attempt to protect an art exhibit.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Father's Day
programme.desc: A case gets personal for Team Scorpion when three convicts break out of prison and one of them is a brilliant hacker who was forced to help the others steal billions online.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Risky Business
programme.desc: Team Scorpion enlists the help of a musician who created a controversial algorithm that generates hit songs to help find the murderer of a music blogger.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Rogue Element
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must help protect Cabe's ex-wife after she uncovers evidence that suggests foul play in the death of a prominent congressman.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Talismans
programme.desc: When a military plane is shot down in Bosnia, Team Scorpion must help recover its stealth technology before it falls into enemy hands.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Revenge
programme.desc: When Sylvester accidentally triggers an explosive device during an investigation, Team Scorpion must focus on finding who's responsible even while their friend's life hangs in the balance.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: On The Double
programme.desc: When Gail Peck’s uniform is stolen, the rookies go after a vigilante who is impersonating a police officer. Meanwhile, Swarek’s off the grid, trying to get information out of former crime enforcer Jamie Brennan.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: God’s Good Grace
programme.desc: While Swarek is brutally interrogated by Jamie Brennan in the basement of a Pickering farmhouse, the rookies help Andy solve a mystery that may reveal Swarek’s location.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fresh Paint
programme.desc: Andy McNally’s first shift on the job turns into mayhem when shots are fired in a downtown rooming house. In the midst of the chaos, Andy triumphantly makes her first big arrest.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Mercury Retrograde
programme.desc: As the other rookies hunt down a dangerous escaped convict, Swarek drags Andy through his undercover hauntson a mission he won’t explain. At first, Andy assumes Swarek is a rogue cop trying to settle scores from his undercover days.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fite Nite
programme.desc: While working on a high-stakes gun raid, Andy and Gail stumble upon a victim of domestic abuse whose brutal experience in the system has taught her not to trust the police.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Signals Crossed
programme.desc: Andy’s undercover skills are tested –and found to be lacking –during a citywidecampaign to clean up the streets, whenshe’s tapped to pose as a prostitute in order to arrest unsuspecting johns.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Nunnington Hall Pt2
programme.desc: The creaky corridors and old rooms of Nunnington Hall have many stories of ghosts and phantoms, Stuart investigates the middle floors and starts to experience unexplained happenings.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House
programme.desc: Karl & Stuart investigate the top floor of this grand Welsh house. The stories of paranormal activity soon come to life as the duo are surrounded by strange occurrences.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the outbuildings of this large estate, where many people have witnessed strange occurrences, some he is about to witness first-hand.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House P2
programme.desc: Stuart investigates the main house alone, although it isn’t long before he feels something is there with him.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Ruthin Castle
programme.desc: Yvette & Karl investigate a jewel in the crown of Great Britain, Ruthin Castle. They take on the infamous room 222 and soon realise they are not alone.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Samlesbury Hall P1
programme.desc: With a history dating back to 1185, Salmesbury Hall is of the UK’s most historic buildings and said to be one of the most haunted. With ghost stories and sightings all over the building, Stuart investigates the ground floor.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Samlesbury Hall P2
programme.desc: Karl investigates the upper floors of this historic building dating back to 1185, and realises he is not alone.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Voices of Pain
programme.desc: On this episode TAPS heads back to the fan favorite; Waverly Hills Sanatorium in Louisville, Kentucky, an abandoned tuberculosis hospital haunted by its former patients and staff.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Christmas Spirit
programme.desc: TAPS gets into the spirit with an investigation of Bethlehem, Pennsylvania.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 12
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hotel Haunts Unleashed
programme.desc: On this episode on Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to South Dakota for the first time to investigate the Alex Johnson Hotel, a place filled with history.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Plot Thickens
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, owners of a haunted theatre in Woonsocket, Rhode Island buy the building next door and activity spikes! TAPS investigates both buildings to see if spirits are traveling between the two locations.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Honey Offering
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to bring peace to two different Nietzschean prides by escorting the princess of one to her arranged marriage to the prince of the other.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Star-Crossed
programme.desc: Rommie's avatar falls in love with what turns out to be the avatar of a warship named Gabriel. Gabriel attempts to infect Rommie with a virus that broadcasts its plans to the warship.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: It Makes a Lovely Light
programme.desc: Beka takes the Andromeda to Tarn-Vedra, but extended time in the slipstream causes side effects. To combat them, Beka starts taking Flash and soon becomes addicted.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: An old memory from the Andromeda is accidentally activated, which sends her on a mission and leaves Dylan and the crew unable to override the command.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and Rommie must rescue Tyr, Harper and Rev from a Magog Worldship.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka, Rev and Tyr crash land after escaping a gang of Nietzscheans, but soon face a new threat: Rev's need to feed.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.143
programme.desc: Dispute arises from dramatic 911 call of husband mauled by pit bull; family feud ensues. Woman sues daughter’s ex-friends for misusing car purchase funds.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.64
programme.desc: A woman claims she was doused with lighter fluid during an argument with her ex-roommate; he claims she had him falsely arrested and countersues for return of belongings.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.187
programme.desc: A man sacrifices his job and house to move for his girlfriend but faces a broken lease and ring dispute after their breakup. Another man is sued by his child's grandmother for allegedly vandalizing her Chrysler Sebring.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.194
programme.desc: Jailed during his birthday after being accused of assault and battery\t\t\t\r\nwhile high on drugs, a young man, who was renting a screened-in\t\t\t\r\nporch of a mobile home, sues his landlord.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.117
programme.desc: Jealousy leads to assault and theft at golf course/Sued for damaging car, trip costs, and phone.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.156
programme.desc: Woman provides home and job for pregnant student denying misconduct. Woman admits to damaging boyfriend's car but denies debt, citing payment for his prison phone bill.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.98
programme.desc: Woman alleges ex threatened son's jail over Subaru. Intoxicated men, post cage fighting, cause injuries, lawsuits.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.109
programme.desc: While away in rehab, a woman claims her ex-husband neglected to pay rent and utilities and broke her bike/A man sues the mother of his child for overpayment of child support; she says he should consider it the back support that he never paid.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.145
programme.desc: Botched football jerseys are the source of contention between fellow team moms who are suing each other for refunds and damages from alleged harassment.\t\t\t\r\nA HUD house inspection leads to a conflict between a teenage mother and her ex-roommates.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.36
programme.desc: Young man admits making payments on dirt bike he claims was a gift from ex-girlfriend/Man accuses 15-year-old of throwing rock at truck on freeway; teenager blames cousin, countersues for harassment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.13
programme.desc: A woman claims her ex-boyfriend asked her to pawn her jewelry to pay their bills; he says she offered to do it/A loan to pay DUI bills is disputed by ex-lovers, one of whom claims it was a birthday gift.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.140
programme.desc: Older couple accuses daughter and stepson-in-law of abuse including unpaid loans and theft; young couple denies. Man denies responsibility for drunk driving accident, claims friend knew he was intoxicated.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must herd farm animals into their proper pens and decide which proteins and starches they will use next.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: This time, the teams compete to create the best Italian opera-inspired dishes, with the winning team getting a shopping trip and a VIP dinner. Later, the teams provide dinner service for members of the Italian Consulate.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Fiery chef Gordon Ramsay puts two teams of aspiring chefs through a series of tough challenges. The teams meet new members before heading into a team challenge in which they must prepare a tasting menu for a dog show.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams roll the dice to determine the ingredients for their next team challenge, while a contestant leaves due to an injury. The cooks cater for music legends during dinner service, including Stewart Copeland and Steven Tyler.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Following the departure of two contestants from the competition, those remaining are challenged to create Indian-inspired meals, with the winning team earning a day of pampering at a luxurious spa.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. He is going undercover to look for ways for the company to grow.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Airplane Arrest
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia are overwhelmed by a swarm of cheerleaders; Matt and Froy interrupt a father and son bonding session gone wrong; the team heads to the raceway to prove they still have what it takes.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: Matt and Froy repo a car from a girl whose roommate has been keeping two very big secrets. Sonia and Froy's repo from a creepy husband reveals some incriminating evidence to his wife.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Showstopper
programme.desc: Matt and Froy repo a car from a girl whose roommate has been keeping two very big secrets. Sonia and Froy's repo from a creepy husband reveals some incriminating evidence to his wife, and when Lou and Sonia can't locate their target car, Lou comes up...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Nursery Crime
programme.desc: While attempting a repo of a "green energy" bio-diesel vehicle, Froy's (Froylan Tercero) lack of knowledge of the vehicle's specialized fuel system sets the bus ablaze... and when his error causes it to explode, he and Matt (Matt Burch) abandon builders.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Call for Help
programme.desc: Sonia and Matt go to a garden center to repo a forklift, but a language barrier causes chaos. Matt and Froy are in danger when Froy refuses to call the cops on a gun-wielding debtor.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Big Letdown
programme.desc: Froy meets with a lawyer, but his legal troubles are worse than expected. Sonia and Froy confront a debtor who uses a homeless man in his ploy to keep his car. Then, Sonia and Froy discover one debtor's alcoholism is only a farce to cover a bigger secret.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Waiting Game
programme.desc: Froy meets with a lawyer, but his legal troubles are worse than expected. Sonia and Froy confront a debtor who uses a homeless man in his ploy to keep his car. Then, Sonia and Froy discover one debtor's alcoholism is only a farce to cover a bigger secret.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Surro-Gate
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey discover surprising news about their surrogate.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Handy Man
programme.desc: When Audrey realizes Jeff is getting a bit bored in the bedroom, she tries to spice it up. Russell gets called out on a business trip, but has a fear of flying. He invites Timmy to distract him.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Play Ball
programme.desc: Audrey considers quitting her job when she realizes it's making her life miserable. Although things are heated between Allison and Timmy, she wants to put their sex life aside so they can spend time getting to know each other.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Baked
programme.desc: Audrey embarks on a new start after quitting her demanding job; however, her time at home makes her stir crazy, prompting her to start a cookie business. Timmy is getting advice from the guys who encourage him to be more of a dude than a gentleman.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Les-Bro
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey embark on finding a surrogate mother, only to run into problems with the interviewing process. Russell's wealthy mother comes to town, and he reluctantly decides to have her stop paying his rent.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Mannequin Head Ball
programme.desc: Stuck with a store Jeff leased for Audrey's fleeting cookie shop, he and Adam stay behind to clean up and discover a new game using the heads of mannequins.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Big Picture
programme.desc: When his mother cuts off Russell’s trust fund, he gets a taste of how life will be after moving in with Timmy. Meanwhile, Audrey helps Jeff impress his boss in order to get a raise.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fun Run
programme.desc: After Jeff tells his altruistic co-workers that requests for charity donations are getting out of hand, Audrey enters into a 10K charity event and plans on having Jeff's staff contribute money toward the cause.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Refusing To Budget
programme.desc: Timmy convinces Russell he needs a budget when the utilities are turned off in his apartment. Meanwhile, Audrey has a mentee who wants to see her office and learn about publishing.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Little Bummer Boy
programme.desc: When Russell decides to borrow a holiday concept of gift-giving from Adam, both Adam and his co-workers are in for surprises. Meanwhile, Audrey wants to make people laugh at Jeff's holiday party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Home Stretch
programme.desc: When Jeff discovers that a guy is giving Audrey home Pilates classes, he wants to make a change. Meanwhile, Adam tells Jennifer specifics about his football past.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bonds of Love
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are finally getting married! They've been together for more than ten years but Dog is determined, as he puts it, to "marry his common law wife the Christian way.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Love and to Cherish
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are off to the Big Island for their wedding. They hope to relax for a few days but it turns out Leland has a fugitive he needs to catch and despite the time limit, neither Dog nor Beth can resist the opportunity to catch a fugitive.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bustin' with Justin
programme.desc: Dog and the team must deal with misleading informants, belligerent boaters, and angry drunks when they go after Kimberly, a traffic offender with over 20 violations. And if that isn't enough, Dog has another problem - Duane Lee is sick.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Run Fugitive, Run
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Vegas or Bust
programme.desc: Dog is going to be the keynote speaker at the annual Profession Bail Agents convention in Las Vegas, but before he leaves he's got to clear two cases from his docket - Heidi and Stephanie.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Playing Possum
programme.desc: Tim's got a big problem. Owen has failed to appear in court. He's on bond for serious drug charges and now Tim could lose $30,000 if he doesn't catch Owen. With Dog's help he tries to track down the co-signer but they come up dry.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rainy Day Woman
programme.desc: It's been raining for days and the team is going a little stir crazy, but Dog has the cure; a good hunt. Maui has failed to appear on a drug charge and the team has just one lead. She was recently spotted during a bust at a local chop shop garage.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ticket to Ride
programme.desc: Dog decides it's time to outfit the Da Kine crew with new SUVs. After a quick visit to their local dealership, they go after Jasmine, a woman whose criminal record includes over 37 arrests for everything from drug promotion to assault.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources - the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then, Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.sub-title: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Termite Be a Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from - Godwin's House. But while at Godwin's house, Godwin gets a taxidermied gift from a past relative.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: John Luke After Dentist
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done, complete with sedation, and it's up to Willie and Korie to take care of them through the process - including getting them back home safely.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Scoot Along Si
programme.desc: Si shows up to work on a mobility scooter, claiming to have an invisible injury from a fender bender with Willie. After losing her beloved turtle "Mr. T", Ms. Kay enlists Phil on a mission to find a new pet turtle.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jerky Boys
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwin's garage and a minibike race. Phil and Kay have made Willie the executor of their will, and Phil wants to show Willie what he and his brothers will inherit when he and Kay pass away.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Going Si-ral
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better. John Luke totals Willie's truck, and Willie realizes he may be raising the two worst drivers in all of Louisiana.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack-O-Lantern
programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse." Everyone dresses up and Willie desperately tries to be the scariest, but none of the kids are afraid of him.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.sub-title: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.(n)

programme.title: Earthling
programme.desc: After a mysterious atmospheric event, a small group of people wake up to realize that their entire lives have been a lie. They are in fact aliens disguised as humans. Now they have to make a choice. Live amongst men, or try to find a way back home.(n)

programme.title: Apocalypse of Ice
programme.desc: Already in the throes of a viral pandemic, a massive polar vortex threatens to cover nearly all of Earth in ice.(n)

programme.title: Queen of Outer Space
programme.desc: American astronauts are drawn by a mysterious force to the planet Venus, which they find to be inhabited only by beautiful women and their despotic queen.(n)

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.(n)

programme.title: Your Highness
programme.desc: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.(n)

programme.title: Then Came You
programme.desc: A lonely widow plans a trip around the world with her husband's ashes, to visit the places they loved in the movies. The first stop on the journey changes her life forever.(n)

programme.title: We Die Young
programme.desc: Sudden Death meets Sicario in this gritty thriller starring action legend Jean Claud Van Damme. When a ruthless drug lord recruits a 10-year-old boy, his older brother is desperate to keep him safe and flees for their lives.(n)

programme.title: The Big Fight
programme.desc: Tien Peng and Cheung Ching-ching play the leaders of a rebel group of Chinese kung fu fighters in a Japanese occupied town at the height of the war.(n)

programme.title: Banana Joe: Banana Joe
programme.desc: A man is living happily on an island with his family, growing bananas. When a local mobster with an eye on man's property tries to take it from him, he must go to the town for the first time to get some help.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Village
programme.desc: To save her reputation, Piper Jensen, a public relations genius and owner of her own PR company, agrees to work for the owner of a failing Santa’s Village and discovers love and how magical Christmas is after all.(n)

programme.title: A Bulldog For Christmas
programme.desc: Becky really hates Christmas. But when she is magically transformed into a cute bulldog, she has to learn the meaning of Christmas and get into the holiday spirit or she may never be changed back. An entertaining Christmas film for the whole family.(n)

programme.title: 48 Christmas Wishes
programme.desc: After losing an entire town's letters to Santa, two junior Elves leave the North Pole and attempt to blend into small town life as they set out to retrieve every missing wish before Santa's sleigh departs on Christmas Eve.(n)

programme.title: Sound Of Christmas
programme.desc: Whilst trying to reignite his daughter’s passion for Christmas, Brad, falls in love with piano teacher, Lizzie. However, their romance is threatened by Brad’s business interests.(n)

programme.title: Eve Of Abduction
programme.desc: When single mom Stephanie gets engaged to single dad Jameson she receives an anonymous stalker’s threat: "Break off the engagement or I’ll kidnap your daughter!" The threats continue and her daughter is taken….(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: Before I Say Goodbye
programme.desc: Nell MacDermott loses her husband in a fiery boating accident and visits a psychic to connect with him again. But when she's informed that he was murdered, Nell is compelled to find the killer searching for an elusive witness who could solve the mystery.(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Teacher
programme.desc: Starring Megan Park, David Charvet, and Boti Bliss. When spoiled, beautiful high-schooler Devon sets her sights on her handsome teacher, she won't take no for an answer - even it means putting getting his girlfriend involved.(n)

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Sam relies on old friends to help him survive new dangers.(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Acrimony
programme.desc: A faithful wife who is tired of standing by her devious husband is enraged when it becomes clear she has been betrayed.(n)

programme.title: Boo! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Cranky, fast-talking Madea (Tyler Perry) finds herself under attack from ghosts, ghouls and zombies after breaking up a fraternity's Halloween party.(n)

programme.title: Gunfight in the Red Sands
programme.desc: An avenging stranger guns down a gang of ruthless bandits in revenge for the murder of his family.(n)

programme.title: The Lawless Frontier
programme.desc: After murdering John Tobin's parents, Zanti attempts to kill a man and kidnap his daughter. Fueled by the desire of revenge and his affections for the lady, Tobin prepares for the fight of his life.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Two Gun Nan
programme.desc: Nan Aspinwall Gabel's horse is her only company as she journeys from San Francisco to New York.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Cockeyed Charlie Parkhurst
programme.desc: Wells Fargo stage driver Charlie Parkhurst wins fame for his daring endeavors.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Great Amulet
programme.desc: Bob Stevenson, his wife Fanny and her two children move to California, where Bob writes stories for the kids.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Telescope Eye
programme.desc: A veteran with a habit of telling tall tales sets out to clear a youth of murder.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Mystery of Suicide Gulch
programme.desc: A boy runs away from home and into the arms of an outlaw after a falling out with his father.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Big Rendezvous
programme.desc: Kit Carson falls for the Native girl he rescued from a Canadian trapper.(n)

programme.title: Switched
programme.desc: Tired of being bullied, Cassandra Evans prays that her nemesis, Katie Sharp, the queen bee of social media, would know what it's like to walk a day in her shoes. Her prayer is answered in an unexpected way when they get "Switched.(n)

programme.title: Storm Boy
programme.desc: When Michael Kingley, a successful retired businessman starts to see images from his past that he can't explain, he's forced to remember his childhood and how, as a boy, he rescued and raised an extraordinary orphaned pelican, Mr Percival.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: Experience the magical world of 'The Secret Garden' as never before in this beautiful production of the classic tale. When her parents are lost in a tragic accident, Mary must seek comfort in the strange and forgotten corridors of Misselthwaite Factory.(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Barney Thomson
programme.desc: Barney Thompson is a downtrodden barber who comically manages to become an unlikely serial killer, whilst attempting to evade a determined detective.(n)

programme.title: The Loss Adjuster
programme.desc: Hapless Insurance Loss Adjuster - Martin Dyer - feels his life is spiralling out of control but discovers that even when you reach rock bottom, that some clouds really do have a silver lining.(n)

programme.title: Groomzilla
programme.desc: A woman is surprised and dismayed when her fiance takes the planning of their wedding too seriously.(n)

programme.title: Climbing High
programme.desc: A wealthy young man pretends to be poor to try and win the affections of a hard-up model despite his engagement to an aristocrat.(n)

programme.title: Clockwise
programme.desc: An obsessively punctual school headmaster sets out to give an important speech to a conference of headteachers. However, the day goes from bad to hideously awful when he boards the wrong train.(n)

programme.title: Convoy
programme.desc: A tale of the highs and lows of life protecting the convoys between America and England during WWII.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Wall
programme.desc: A U.S. military experiment opens a portal to an unknown place. After sending through one team, the Army calls upon a career soldier to investigate, where he finds an idyllic planet. He has to decide whether to stay or go back to his old life.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Cat and Mouse
programme.desc: A shy woman finds that a cat is actually a cursed "Casanova." She falls for the man but finds that her Prince Charming is actually a scoundrel.(n)

programme.title: Rendezvous in a Dark Place
programme.desc: An old woman with an obsession with death attends funerals for entertainment. One night when an injured thief breaks into her home, she lets him die and waits for Death to come and collect him.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Many, Many Monkeys
programme.desc: An epidemic breaks out and many people are struck blind. Something more happens, however: People have become cold and heartless toward each other.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Her Pilgrim Soul/I of Newton
programme.desc: Two scientists named Kevin and Daniel are experimenting with a holographic device/ A mathematics professor accidentally makes a bargain with the devil and has to figure a way out.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Blacklight (REDUX)
programme.desc: A cryogenic chamber in an abandoned section of the Tulip is accidentally powered up, and the legendary Colonel Bramwell emerges from a 50-year sleep.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Goodbye So Long (REDUX)
programme.desc: Soon after Dante reconnects with an old friend, he appears to be killed in an accident.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Normandy
programme.desc: In a look back to 1944 and World War II, Magnus has learned of a new weather controlling device developed by the Nazis and intended to be deployed against the approaching allied armada.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Carentan
programme.desc: The Sanctuary receives reports that several people have gone missing, all around the town of Carentan in the Normandy region of France.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Out Of The Blue
programme.desc: Meet Helen and Will: neighbors on a tree-lined, suburban street. Helen lives alone, dislikes her neighbor’s dog and is a talented painter.(n)

programme.title: Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe: The Pool of Peril
programme.desc: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Zarkov return to the planet Mongo for an antidote to the Purple Death, which wreaking destruction on Earth. However, Ming the Merciless has other plans for them.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: Cave of Fear
programme.desc: Professor Challenger is taken hostage. To save him, the group, goes into the cave of fear to retrieve bones for a ritual offering. In the process, they revisit the dark corners of their past.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: Salvation
programme.desc: Summerlee saves an unconscious child from a river with CPR, which convinces the village leader they are witches. They will be burned on the stake unless they can influence the council otherwise.(n)
